sources.title: A Woman's Man
sources.description: Title: A Woman's Man Summary: A temperamental movie star storms off the set of her latest picture in order to carry on a fling with an ambitious, publicity-hungry prizefighter. Directed by: Edward Ludwig Actors: John Halliday, Marguerite De La Motte, Wallace Ford Production Company: W.T. Lackey Productions Release Date: 7 February 1934 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A temperamental movie star storms off the set of her latest picture in order to carry on a fling with an ambitious, publicity-hungry prizefighter.
